I recorded at a=A0 100 year old beach house investigation in 2004 and not o=
nly heard real time, "Hello" with my ears but caught it on camera and my re=
action to it.
=A0
Frank R.

I am curious if anyone with a microphone wired to a remote site =
has ever gotten any EVP in real time.
=A0
I=A0took part in=A0an investigati=
on of Ashmore Estates, near Ashmore IL, on Saturday night. We had six video=
 cameras set up in the three halls of the building. The video for all=A0was=
 being monitored and recorded=A0at a central location. Alas, we did not hav=
e microphones at the camera sites conected to the central location. I wonde=
r what we might have heard if we did?
=A0
Zack

=A0

's just agree to end this discussion about her...
